A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I can't rate this movie low enough. Disney has destroyed my enjoyment of anything Star Wars.  They have turned it into a blatant money grab\, from the horrible movies to the horrible games.\nThe original\, theatrical versions of the first three films are what are great about the fiction.  Unfortunately\, it appears that it will always be limited to those three films.  I have no more interest in viewing any future films.  \nThanks to Lucas and Disney\, I simply don't care about the franchise anymore.
